name: Compress Data and Lock With Password for Exfiltration With 7-ZIP
description: An adversary may compress or encrypt data that is collected prior to exfiltration using 3rd party utilities
false_positives: Command line parameter combinations that contain all included strings
query: (process.command_line:(/.*7[Zz]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee].*/ OR /.*7[Zz][Aa]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee].*/) AND process.command_line:/.*\ \-[Pp].*/ AND process.command_line:(/.*\ [Aa]\ .*/ OR /.*\ [Uu]\ .*/))
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(process.command_line:(*7z.exe* OR *7za.exe*) AND process.command_line:*\ \-p* AND process.command_line:(*\ a\ * OR *\ u\ *))`
